newsitem.title: PORTUGAL: Banco Mello shares stop trading in Lisbon.
newsitem.headline: Banco Mello shares stop trading in Lisbon.

text.p: Shares in Banco Mello stopped trading on Tuesday following a recent decision by the Mello group shareholders to withdraw the stock from the market, market sources said.
Shares in Banco Mello Comercial will remain on the bourse.
Bourse officials were not available to comment.

The Mello group's annual general meeting voted earlier this month to remove the Banco Mello shares which last traded on September 20 at 1,173 escudos. Banco Mello Comercial shares were quoted down one escudo at 1,303.
